attributes.action: Return to the previous pay system on the Lake Windermere Ferry
attributes.background: Let's return the ferry service to the previous paying system and get crossings increased and back on the timetable for this vital link. Cumbria County Council's new scheme is ludicrous, isn't working and is destroying a vital link to the communities on the western side of Lake Windermere.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
